name: Super Netwalk Deluxe
description:
A take on the classic logic puzzle "Netwalk" adding multiple networks that must be joined with routers.

You can use mouse: left and right click to rotate, and middle click to toggle lock a tile.

You can use arrow keys to move the cursor and Z,X to rotate, C to toggle lock a tile.

New puzzles each day!

Press M to toggle audio, N to skip to the next level, they get harder and more interesting
